gamerule.doBetterMaps.description: Use the 'Maps of the Unknown' exploration map generator, to lighten the loot processing load
gamerule.doBetterMapsLoot: Toggle 'Maps of the Unknown' in loot chests
gamerule.doBetterMapsLoot.description: Use 'Maps of the Unknown' map generator in loot chests ; requires main mod toggle
gamerule.doBetterMapsTrades: Toggle 'Maps of the Unknown' in villager trades
gamerule.doBetterMapsTrades.description: Use 'Maps of the Unknown' map generator in villager trades ; requires main mod toggle
gamerule.doBetterMapFromPlayerPos.descri: Makes the 'Maps of the Unknown' maps locate the structure from the player pos when activated, instead of the original chest pos
gamerule.doBetterMapsDynamicLocating.des: Makes locating structures threaded, to prevent freezing the world while it is running
